about.legacy_compassion: Legacy of Compassion, A Future of Care
about.medlinks_desc: Our journey began twenty years ago in the heart of medical charity, working closely with hospitals and witnessing firsthand the struggles patients face after their hospital stay.
about.medical_devices_desc1: It was this belief that shaped MedLinks. We are more than a provider of medical devices; we are advocates for patient dignity and well-being.
about.medical_devices_desc2: Born from our deep-rooted experience in medical charity, we understand the challenges patients face beyond the hospital doors.
about.mission_desc1: At MedLinks, we believe that healing is not just a medical process—it's a human journey that deserves comfort, dignity, and accessibility.
about.mission_desc2: Our mission is to empower individuals with high-quality medical equipment and compassionate healthcare services.
about.vision_desc1: We envision a future where no patient feels abandoned in their journey toward recovery.
about.vision_desc2: At MedLinks, our vision is to revolutionize medical accessibility, transforming the way people experience care beyond hospital walls.
about.vision_desc3: Because recovery isn't just about medical treatment—it's about dignity, choice, and the unwavering right to heal with comfort.
about.values_desc: These principles guide every decision we make and every solution we provide
about.compassion_desc: Every interaction is guided by empathy, understanding, and genuine care for the wellbeing of others.
about.dignity_desc: We uphold patient dignity in every service, ensuring respect and honor throughout the healing journey.
about.accessibility_desc: Healthcare should be accessible to all, regardless of location, background, or financial circumstances.
about.excellence_desc: We strive for excellence in everything we do, continuously improving our services and support.
about.join_mission: Join us in our mission to make quality healthcare accessible, comfortable, and affordable for everyone.

header.title: Privacy Policy & Terms
header.subtitle: Your privacy and security are our top priorities. Learn how we protect and handle your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms and accompanying definitions apply to your use of our services. "MED LINKS MEDICAL, SURGICAL EQUIPMENT & INSTRUMENTS TRADING CO. L.L.C", "mymedlinks," "we," "us," or "our" is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard the data you provide.
introduction.guarantee: All credit/debit cards' details and personally identifiable information will NOT be stored, sold, shared, rented or leased to any third parties.

security.title: Security & Data Protection

payment.title: Payment Security
payment.content: mymedlinks will not pass any debit/credit card details to third parties.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.content: We take appropriate steps to ensure data privacy and security including through various hardware and software methodologies.

security.disclaimer: However, mymedlinks (website) cannot guarantee the security of any information that is disclosed online.
security.thirdParty: mymedlinks is not responsible for the privacy policies of websites to which it links. If you provide any information to such third parties, different rules regarding the collection and use of your personal information may apply. You should contact these entities directly if you have any questions about their use of the information that they collect.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our services may be offered through third-party entities. Although we partner with reputable providers, we are not responsible for their actions or policies. By using our services, you acknowledge and accept these risks. For more information, please refer to our full Terms of Service or contact us.

items.item-1: MED LINKS MEDICAL, SURGICAL EQUIPMENT & INSTRUMENTS TRADING CO. L.L.C
items.item-1-def: Refers to mymedlinks, an online platform for medical supplies and equipment.
items.item-2-def: Refers to the individual using mymedlinks services.
items.item-3-def: Refers to the mymedlinks website at www.mymedlinks.com.
items.item-4-def: Refers to the agreement between you and mymedlinks that governs your use of mymedlinks services.

detailedPolicies.title: Detailed Privacy Policies
detailedPolicies.description: Comprehensive information about how we handle your data

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.content: We may collect personal data such as your name, email, address, and payment details when you place an order, create an account, or contact us. We also receive your IP address automatically to better understand your device and improve user experience.

useOfInformation.title: Use of Information
useOfInformation.content: We use your information to fulfill orders, communicate about orders and accounts, send promotional materials (with consent), and enhance our site and service quality using usage data.

disclosureOfInformation.title: Disclosure of Information
disclosureOfInformation.content: Your personal data may be shared with trusted third-party providers who assist in running our website and services. These partners are bound by confidentiality and data security agreements. Information may also be disclosed if legally required or to protect safety and property.

privacySecurity.title: Privacy and Security
privacySecurity.content: We implement industry-standard measures like SSL encryption to keep your personal information safe from unauthorized access or misuse.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Mymedlinks uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser, but some site features may be affected.

ageConsent.title: Age of Consent
ageConsent.content: By using our website, you confirm that you are of legal age in your location or have obtained parental permission.

policyChanges.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. All changes will take effect immediately upon posting. Please review this page regularly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For questions, feedback, or concerns about our privacy practices

address.label: Address
address.value: Showroom: Al Qusais Industrial first, 242-107, Dubai

header.title: Terms and Conditions
header.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services. By accessing our website, you agree to be bound by these terms.

companyInformation.title: Company Information
companyInformation.legalEntityContent: "MED LINKS MEDICAL, SURGICAL EQUIPMENT & INSTRUMENTS TRADING CO. L.L.C" maintains the mymedlinks Website.

legalJurisdiction.title: Legal Jurisdiction
legalJurisdiction.content: Any purchase, dispute or claim arising out of or in connection with this website shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of UAE.

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.currencyText: The displayed price and currency at the checkout page will be the same price and currency printed on the Transaction Receipt and the amount charged to the card will be shown in your card currency.

tradingRestrictions.title: Trading Restrictions
tradingRestrictions.content: We will not trade with or provide any services to OFAC and sanctioned countries.

detailedTermsAndConditions.title: Detailed Terms and Conditions
detailedTermsAndConditions.description: Comprehensive terms governing the use of our services
detailedTermsAndConditions.ageRequirementsContent: Users must be at least 18 years old to use the website.
detailedTermsAndConditions.Users must be 18 years or older to creat: Users must be 18 years or older to create an account
detailedTermsAndConditions.Age verification may be required for cer: Age verification may be required for certain transactions
detailedTermsAndConditions.Parental consent does not override this: Parental consent does not override this restriction
detailedTermsAndConditions.We reserve the right to verify age at an: We reserve the right to verify age at any time

accountResponsibility.title: Account Responsibility
accountResponsibility.content: User is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account.
accountResponsibility.yourResponsibility4: Use account only for legitimate purposes

transactionRecords.title: Transaction Records
transactionRecords.content: Cardholder must retain a copy of transaction records and mymedlinks policies and rules.
transactionRecords.subTitle: Record Keeping Requirements:
transactionRecords.point1: Save all transaction confirmations and receipts
transactionRecords.point2: Keep copies of terms and conditions
transactionRecords.point3: Maintain records for warranty and return purposes

liabilityLimitations.title: Liability and Limitations
liabilityLimitations.alert: Our liability is limited as per UAE law. We provide services "as is" and make no warranties beyond those required by law.
liabilityLimitations.subTitle: Limitation of Liability:
liabilityLimitations.point1: Services provided on an "as is" basis
liabilityLimitations.point4: Maximum liability limited to purchase amount

modifications.title: Terms Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.
modifications.subTitle: Notification of Changes:

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Thank you for choosing MedLinks. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our terms and conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
contact.addressValue: Showroom: Al Qusais Industrial first, 242-107, Dubai, UAE
contact.businessHours: Business Hours: Sunday to Thursday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (UAE Time)

hero.title: Return and Refund Policy
hero.description: Thank you for shopping at MedLinks. We are committed to ensuring your satisfaction with every purchase. Please read our return and refund policy carefully to understand your rights and obligations.

eligibility.title: Return Eligibility
eligibility.returnWindowDescription: We accept returns within 7 days of product delivery or booking, provided the item is unused and in the same condition as received. It must also be in its original packaging.
eligibility.originalPackagingDesc: Item must be in original packaging
eligibility.unusedConditionDesc: Product must be unused and undamaged
eligibility.sameConditionDesc: Must be in same condition as received
eligibility.alert: Important: Certain items are exempt from returns for hygiene and safety reasons, including intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, flammable liquids, gift cards, custom-made products, and specific health and personal care items.

returnPolicy.title: Detailed Return & Refund Policies
returnPolicy.description: Comprehensive information about returns, refunds, and exchanges

partialRefunds.title: Partial Refunds
partialRefunds.desc: Partial refunds may be granted under the following conditions:
partialRefunds.conditionDesc: If the item is not in its original condition, damaged, or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
partialRefunds.lateDesc: If the item is returned after 7 days of delivery.

delivery.title: Delivery Policy
delivery.alert: Delivery Tip: Avoid any delivery delay by providing your full address along with your contact details.

refund.title: Refund Processing
refund.methodDesc: We provide refunds only via the original mode of payment. Refund processing time varies between 10 to 45 days depending on the issuing bank of the credit card.
refund.confirmDesc: Once payment is made, confirmation notice will be sent via email within 24 hours of receipt.
refund.processingDesc: Refunds processed within 10-45 days depending on your bank's processing time.

returnProcess.title: Return Process
returnProcess.requirementsDesc: We accept returns within 7 days of receipt, only if the delivery packaging has not been opened or the products are damaged or incorrect.
returnProcess.r1: • Items must be sealed and untampered
returnProcess.alert: Important: We reserve the right to refuse returned shipments if the product has been used or tampered with. Shipping & handling fees are non-refundable.

cancel.title: Cancellation Policy
cancel.desc1: Customers can cancel their orders before the product is shipped to the provided address within 7 days, if payment was made in advance.
cancel.desc2: Refunds for canceled orders will be issued back to the original payment method. Please allow up to 45 days for the refund transfer to be completed.

missing.title: Late or Missing Refunds
missing.desc: If you haven't received a refund yet, please follow these steps:
missing.proc4: • Contact us if longer delays occur

exchange.title: Exchanges
exchange.desc1: We only replace items if they are defective or damaged upon receipt.
exchange.desc2: To initiate an exchange, please email us at info@mymedlinks.com, and we will arrange for the pickup of the item to be returned.

shipping.title: Shipping for Returns
shipping.returnDesc: To return your product, please email us at info@mymedlinks.com, and we will arrange for the pickup of the product from the original delivery address.
shipping.cost4: • Shipping times may vary by location
